document_data.mainbody:
oonthumb Necessities was a general goods store that catered to adventurers located in Tulmon along the Lake of Steam during the mid-to-late 14 century DR.
The shop was located on Ooloolar Street in Tulmon.
The shop was known for its great selection of ropes and most Tulmonites came there for their rope needs. Additionally, just about any piece of adventuring equipment could be found with the shops crammed confines or cellar.
Moonthumb Necessities was owned by Khaligeira Moonthumb.
